name: Gift Grinder
description:
As a trusty assembly line robot, dispatch each item towards the right conveyor belt.
Avoid putting cute animals into the grinder, or gifting coal or dynamite to the children waiting in line for their presents.

While fully playable in the browser for computer users, the game is meant to be played on a mobile device, so opt for downloading the .apk file if possible.

Tactical advice :

- Astute use of dynamite to get rid of unwanted items is  key.  Any item in contact with dynamite will be destroyed, however living pets simply caught in the explosion will leave a corpse behind. 

- Keeping some items around until they are needed  may be better than letting them reach the end of their designated conveyor belt as soon as possible.

- Whenever a mistake is committed, you're allowed a short window of invincibility. In a crisis, consider slipping a couple of them at the same time.

Credit where it's due :

- Fonts used : Grobold and Alarm Clock

This was envisioned as a submission to a holiday season game jam. Due to some real-life contingencies, it was instead made in a week for the January catch-up jam's.
